items.text: good length outside off stump, and spinning inwards. Punched off the back foot to mid off
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Liton Das, no run

items.text: flighted on leg stump, and he shuffles inside the line of the ball, and then drives inside-out to long off
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off stump. Mehidy pushes with soft hands and calls for a quick single even before point could start running towards the ball
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.preText: Dr. Ahsan: "Mashrafe is the best captain we have. He is like Imran khan of Pakistan... Bangladesh will have difficulty in finding another captain like him in future "
items.text: good length on leg stump, and this one goes straight through. Worked off the back foot to square leg for a quick run once again
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: full outside off stump. Spinning away from the batsman, and he punches this off the front foot to wide long off
items.shortText: Jadeja to Liton Das, 1 run

items.preText: Dhoni's having a chat with the umpire. Wonder why. A delay in proceedings.
items.text: full just outside off stump, and Mehidy takes a big stride forward to lean into a drive
items.shortText: Jadeja to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: full just outside off again, but Mehidy knows this length now. Pushed to cover off the front foot
items.shortText: Jadeja to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: length ball just outside off, and Mehidy rocks back to try and cut this square. Too close to his body, and just misses the outside of his bat
items.shortText: Jadeja to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: good length, but wider outside off. Mehidy connects with the cut this time, but it's been mistimed to backward point
items.shortText: Jadeja to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: full just outside off, and he caresses a drive past the diving bowler's left to long off. Ruins the chance of a maiden over for Jadeja, but it was still excellent bowling from the left-arm spinner
items.postText: Deepesh Agrawal: "Let's not hit the panic button, it's just one man's brilliance. Look at the strike rate at the other end, it'll only add pressure on Liton. One wicket and it could all quickly change."
items.shortText: Jadeja to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: full on off stump, and he smothers a check-drive past cover's right to wide long off
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: overpitched just outside off stump, and he allows Mehidy to free his arms. Crunches a square drive with the angled bat past the diving cover-point fielder. Rayudu the guilty man there
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, FOUR runs

items.text: length ball on off, and spinning into the batsman. Goes onto the back foot, and whips it off his hips to midwicket
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: full just outside off stump, and pushed with the bat's open face to cover
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.preText: This is Bangladesh's second-highest opening stand against India
items.text: paddled! Full on off, and he goes down on one knee. Scoops it past MSD's left for a couple more
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 2 runs

items.text: full just outside off stump. Mehidy shuffles across to his off stump, and fends off the back foot
items.postText: akbr: "Liton Das is copying Mohammad Shahzad's performance against India." -- and importantly, he's also playing according to the bowling now. Not hitting wildly, which Rayudu and Rahul were guilty of after getting to their fifties against Afghanistan.
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: good length just outside off, and punched off the back foot to cover
items.shortText: Jadeja to Liton Das, no run

items.text: big shout for lbw! But not given. Length ball on off, and the batsman came down the ground to try and swing across to the leg side. Hit his front eg, but he was halfway down the ground
items.shortText: Jadeja to Liton Das, no run

items.preText: Shashank in Dubai: We're not yet into the 'testy Ravi Shastri post-game press conference' territory, but this will be a good test for India's spinners. All tournament, they've come in with the fast bowlers strangulating top orders. Here, they're the enforcers on the face of a sustained attack from Liton.
items.text: back of a length on off, and Liton uses the depth of his crease to pull this right over the mid-wicket fielder. Timed well enough to clear the infield
items.shortText: Jadeja to Liton Das, FOUR runs

items.text: full just outside off, and the front-foot drive goes straight to Rohit at cover
items.shortText: Jadeja to Liton Das, no run

items.text: swung across the line! But Rayudu's sliding effort in the deep stops the boundary. Full outside off, and he dragged a slog-sweep from outside the stumps
items.shortText: Jadeja to Liton Das, 2 runs

items.text: full on off stump, and pushed off the front foot to wide long off for a walking single
items.shortText: Jadeja to Liton Das, 1 run

items.preText: Upesh : "Another champions Trophy Final in the making for India. They are fielding like they don't care how many runs Bangladesh scores, they will chase it. " -- the intensity in the field, though, has gone up after the Chahal drop. They've got the wake up call now. Rohit looks worried already with the proceedings.
items.text: full on leg stump, and the leg-side push takes a leading edge past the vacant first-slip region! First real false shot.
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Liton Das, 2 runs

items.text: waist-high full toss on off stump, and he uncomfortably punches this past the cover fielder to the man in the deep
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off, and spinning into the batsman. Driven off the front foot to cover
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run
